data.title: Amazon.com: Suman Sharma: books, biography, latest update
data.meta_description: Follow Suman Sharma and explore their bibliography from Amazon.com's Suman Sharma Author Page.
data.text:
Suman Sharma was born in holy city of Amritsar. Apart from being a guest faculty in Police Training College of Himachal, he at present is enrolled as full time Research Scholar in Central University of Himachal Pradesh. The Author resides in Padhyarkhar village of Tehsil Palampur of District Kangra Himachal Pradesh. Apart from the present novel, the author had translated stories ‘Bukhari’ by Narender Nirmohi and ‘Khacchar’ by Kesav from Hindi to English language. Author rejoices in traveling, Sufi music, ghazals, cycling, acts of charity and observing the intricacies of life.

Read full bio
